text: وَأَوۡحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحۡلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِي مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتٗا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعۡرِشُونَ

translation.en: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct
translation.id: Dan Tuhanmu mengilhamkan kepada lebah, "Buatlah sarang di gunung-gunung, di pohon-pohon kayu, dan di tempat-tempat yang dibikin manusia
